titles.title: SF650 Heal us, Immanuel! Hear our prayer;

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines:
Remember him who once applied
with trembling for relief:
'Lord, I believe!' with tears he cried,
'O help my unbelief!'

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
She, too, who touched you in the press,
and healing virtue stole,
was answered:'Daughter, go in peace,
your faith has made you whole.'

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Concealed amid the gathering throng,
she would have shunned your view;
and if her faith was firm and strong,
had strong misgivings too.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Like her, with hopes and fears we come
to touch you, if we may;
O send us not despairing home,
send none unhealed away!
